      • update

        public void update​(float deltaTime,
                   float pitch,
                   float yaw,
                   boolean launch,
                   boolean held)
        Launches the ball in the direction that the player is facing if they are holding it and clicking
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - - the time between updates
        pitch - - the pitch of the player model
        yaw - - the yaw of the player model
        launch - - to launch or not
        held - - is the ball held by a player
